title: Potential Trade: T206 Chief Myers Batting Broad Leaf
author: JoeRand

posts.post_title: Potential Trade: T206 Chief Myers Batting Broad Leaf
posts.post_content: Just acquired T206 Chief Myers batting Broad Leaf PSA 1 (but looks better) from the Heritage auction that ended on Thursday 7/30.  Love the card but will consider a trade for a different off back Myers (no Piedmont or Sweet Cap... only AB, Cycle, or Tolstoi...  plus $ or other off backs I need.  PM if interested.
